title: Poster Design
tagline: Custom movie posters tailored to your film's tone, genre, and style.
description: We focus on creating visuals that not only look stunning but also sell your story, grab attention in crowded marketplaces, and give your project the competitive edge it deserves.

qa.question: In what format will I receive the files?
qa.answer: JPG format is included in all packages.Layered, editable source files (e.g. PSD) are included in Premium or can be added on for Standard or Basic.

qa.question: How long does it take to complete my order?
qa.answer: Basic: approx 7-10 days after receiving your design brief and all required assets. Standard: approx 5-7 days. Premium: faster delivery (e.g. 3-5 days) plus express/rush option for tighter deadlines (48-hour turnarounds) at extra cost.

qa.question: How many revisions are included?
qa.answer: Basic: 1 revision (of the chosen concept). Standard: up to 3 revisions. Premium: up to 5 revisions + minor tweaks beyond that are possible for a small extra charge

qa.question: Are source or editable files included?
qa.answer: Only Premium automatically includes source/editable files. For Standard or Basic, source files are available as an add-on.

qa.question: Usage & rights
qa.answer: Once the design is finalized and full payment is received, you get full usage rights for the final design as per the chosen package (for print, festivals, web, social media, etc.). Any licensed assets or stock images will have their license terms respected. Having the source file allows you to make edits, but the design rights are non-transferable/resalable unless otherwise agreed.

qa.question: What happens to design materials after order completion?
qa.answer: All working files, drafts, and unused mockups are deleted within 7 days of project completion. Final files that you purchased remain yours.

qa.question: How do I place an order and what do you need from me?
qa.answer: To get started, please provide: Your chosen package (Basic, Standard, or Premium) + any extras (source file, extra revisions, rush delivery). A design brief: film title, genre, tone, audience, reference images or designs you like (and dislike), any logos or tagline text, and necessary credits. Any assets (logos, images, fonts) you want included. Sizes if known, deadlines.

qa.question: Payment, cancellation & refunds
qa.answer: Full payment is required prior to starting any work. If you cancel before concepts are delivered, partial refund may apply (depending on how much work has been done). If you are not happy with initial concepts, we will work within your revision allowance to get things right. Extra revisions or changes outside the chosen package are billed separately.

qa.question: I have a question, who do I contact?
qa.answer: If you have a question or you are not sure what package you need please contact us at newbusiness@sanrokuku.com

title: Filmhub Graphics Design
tagline: Properly formatted Filmhub and streaming platform graphics made for compliance, visibility, and sales.
description: Filmhub and digital streaming platforms require multiple graphics with different ratios, sizes, and compositions. Incorrect sizing leads to rejection, delays, or poor catalog placement. We resize, optimize, and create additional artwork variants aligned with platform expectations to help your film present professionally and stand out.

qa.question: What is included in the Filmhub Graphics service?
qa.answer: We resize and format your existing poster art for Filmhub compliant dimensions and modern marketplace use. Depending on your chosen package, this may include multiple variants for vertical key art, wide banners, square crops, platform thumbnails, and sales-focused compositions.

qa.question: In what format will I receive the files?
qa.answer: Final files are delivered in JPG and web-optimized formats. Layered, editable source files (such as PSD) are included in Premium or available as an add-on for Standard or Basic.

qa.question: How long does it take to complete my order?
qa.answer: Basic: approx 3–5 days after receiving your assets and brief. Standard: approx 3–5 days. Premium: approx 2–3 days with optional express delivery for urgent deadlines (48-hour turnaround available for an additional fee).

qa.question: How many revisions are included?
qa.answer: Basic: 1 revision. Standard: up to 2 revisions. Premium: up to 5 revisions with minor tweaks beyond that available for a small additional charge.

qa.question: Do you design a poster from scratch?
qa.answer: Poster design from scratch is not included in the Basic or Standard Filmhub Graphics packages. The Premium tier covers full poster artwork creation if you do not already have a poster.

qa.question: Are source or editable files included?
qa.answer: Premium automatically includes the editable layered files. Basic and Standard can receive source files as an optional paid add-on.

qa.question: Usage & rights
qa.answer: Once final files are approved and paid in full, you receive usage rights for distribution platforms, marketing, web, and social. The original layered design structure remains non-transferable for resale or redistribution unless otherwise licensed.

qa.question: Will you add cast names, credits, or billing block?
qa.answer: To comply with Filmhub regulations, we do not add a billing block or list cast and crew details. Placement, size, and visibility rules must align with marketplace requirements.

qa.question: What happens to drafts and artwork after completion?
qa.answer: All unused mockups, layouts, and working files are deleted within 7 days of project completion. You retain only the final deliverables included in your chosen package.

qa.question: How do I place an order and what do you need from me?
qa.answer: Please submit: your chosen package (Basic, Standard, Premium), any extras (source files, express delivery), your poster or artwork files, and any marketplace-specific notes or restrictions.

qa.question: Payment, cancellation & refunds
qa.answer: Full payment is required before work begins. If cancellation occurs before delivery of first concepts, a partial refund may be possible depending on progress made. Requests beyond included revisions are billed separately.

qa.question: I have questions, who do I contact?
qa.answer: If you are unsure which package fits your needs, contact us at newbusiness@sanrokuku.com
